argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lspval.v | |- V = ( Base ` W ) |
| 2 |  | lspval.s | |- S = ( LSubSp ` W ) |
| 3 |  | lspval.n | |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) |
| 4 |  | #P_snssi | |- ( X e. V -> { X } C_ V ) |
| 5 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_lspcl | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ { X } C_ V ) -> ( N ` { X } ) e. S ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_sylan2 | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ X e. V ) -> ( N ` { X } ) e. S ) |
